cgcloud__Account_Set_Manager__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Set_Manager__c
cgcloud__Account_Set_Manager__c.description: Custom object to store the relation between Customer Set and User.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the Customer Set manager record is active (true) or not (false).

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Customer Set Manager record.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The date from when the record is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The date until when the record is valid.
